Title: Avoid Business Failures and Restore Your Profits
Description:
Today we’ll hear about:

•       How to reopen a business that’s a good concept but failed under prior management

•       A business owner who’s making $16 million a year and growing

•       The top things you should watch out for when buying a business

•       Why it’s so important to have a succession plan in place with a family business
